channel.title: Moremi Lions Channel, iPod
channel.itunes:author: Earth-Touch.com
channel.description: The Moremi lions channel show features all the best Earth-Touch footage from the Moremi Game Reserve in Botswana, Southern Africa all in one show. This is a great way to get a bite size package of the wildlife happenings Earth-Touch has seen in Botswana. These shows are free to all.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Moremi lions channel show features all the best Earth-Touch footage from the Moremi Game Reserve in Botswana, Southern Africa all in one show. This is a great way to get a bite size package of the wildlife happenings Earth-Touch has seen in Botswana.

item.title: Lions of Moremi, 06 2009
item.itunes:author: Earth-Touch
item.description: This week's Lions of Moremi podcast showcases the Xakanaxa pride well fed, content and lazy.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week's Lions of Moremi podcast showcases the Xakanaxa pride well fed, content and lazy.
